document_data.name: Sable
document_data.mainbody: '''Sable''' was the [[falcon]] companion of [[Keren Donnell]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite digital book/Darkwalker on Moonshae|1266}}
document_data.Description: Sable was a huge black falcon.{{Cite digital book/Darkwalker on Moonshae|1164}}
document_data.History:
In [[1345 DR]], the first time [[Tristan Kendrick]] and his companions fought a group of [[firbolg]]s, Keren and Sable arrived just in time to save the day, but not before [[Arlen]] was slain.

A while later, it was Sable who told [[Robyn Moonsinger|Robyn]] that Keren had been captured by firbolgs and needed their help.{{Cite digital book/Darkwalker on Moonshae|1823}}
